txt.en: With the passing of Black Riders from the East, the disease-bearing sickle-flies of the Midgewater Marshes have begun to breed more rapidly, threatening to spread contagion among the inhabitants of Bree-land. You are tasked with ending the threat of the sickle-flies' plague.
People may snicker, but how many of them have had to fight one of these giant bloodsuckers?
